title: Graphic Design & Video Editor / Design Coordinator (Permanent Remote/WFH)
description:
Join a Fast-Growing US Mobile Marketing Agency as a Key Design Partner within our Creative Team



HOW TO APPLY



Read all the way through to know how to apply and get noticed.



Job Summary



This role is not your typical design coordinator position. You won’t be working in isolation like a freelancer; instead, you’ll be collaborating daily with teams across the company who are all pushing toward ambitious goals and groundbreaking initiatives. Prompt, clear communication isn’t just a nice-to-have here; it’s the key to delivering excellence.



At Intrinsic Digital, we foster a supportive, fun, and diverse culture where competence, problem-solving, and innovation drive everything we do. That’s why this position is designed for resilient problem solvers; people who can stay steady under pressure, think critically, and rise to challenges head-on.



We’re looking for a proactive, design-savvy individual who thrives on solving problems every day, while keeping collaboration, communication, and team success at the forefront. If you take initiative, stay organized under pressure, and find fulfillment in ensuring smooth design collaboration with the creative team, we’d love to hear from you.



Employment Type: Full-time, local employment with standard employment deductions

Work hours: 7 am-3 pm EST (subject to change), and then choice of start times after first month, starting at 6 pm PH time.

Required Hours: 40 hours per week, 8 hours per day

Work Schedule: Monday to Friday

Work Set-up: Remote (Company laptop and external monitor will be provided). The ideal applicants should reside within Metro Manila and aren’t presently engaged with any company/client

Salary Range: Up to Php 68,000/monthly (with comprehensive benefits package)

Start Date: Immediately (ASAP)



Hiring Process



1. Screening call

2. Sample creative project/assignment

3. First interview

4. Final interview

5. Full-time job offer under 6-month probationary period

6. Permanent position



Who We Are



Intrinsic Digital, Inc. (
) is at the forefront of digital marketing. Our service lines include Apartment Geofencing, Kurie, Hotel Geofencing and Restaurant Geofencing, offering mobile and streaming TV advertising to the multifamily, hospitality, and restaurant industries.



Intrinsic Digital is a fully remote company with tea
mbers located across the United States and the Philippines. Our culture is based around our Core Focus, “We love the journey and embrace what’s next” and six Core Values: Accountability, Authenticity, Caring, Neutralevity, Surprise & Delight and X-Ray Vision. We may be remote, but no one is isolated in their work. Our initial onboarding and ongoing collaboration efforts have formed a cohesive team. We were voted No. 1 Best Place to Work in Multifamily and certified Great Places to Work in 2024. Employees consistently score us above 9 out of 10 on two key satisfaction categories: “Intrinsic Digital cares about my well-being” and “I would recommend Intrinsic Digital as a great place to work.”



Who You Are



You’re a self-motivated individual who is passionate about design and driving results. You are detail-oriented, communicate clearly with your team, and feel confident taking ownership of creative tasks with minimal guidance.



Qualifications



• 2+ years of experience in digital marketing, graphic design, or a related creative field

• A bachelor's degree in a relevant field is preferred

• A strong portfolio demonstrating graphic design skills is required; experience with animated banners or video projects is a plus

• Experience in graphic design or animation software and tools such as Canva, Creatopy, Adobe Photoshop, After Effects or similar editing tools

• Proficiency in creating and editing videos using industry-standard software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar video editing tools

• Experience in copywriting and proofing to handle headline & script writing with no grammar errors, clear sentence structure and proper pronunciation for video voice overs

• Demonstrated ability to mentor peers and contribute to a collaborative team environment

• Ability to self-manage tasks using tools like Asana or similar project management platforms

• Collaborative mindset and strong communication skills when working with internal teams.

• Experience with DSPs such as Simpli.fi is a plus



Four Must-Have Skills



• Strong creative background & visual design skills

• Experience with a task management system, like Asana, Trello, Monday, is a big plus

• Banner editing experience in Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva or equivalent platforms

• Video editing experience in After Effects, Premiere Pro, Final Cut or equivalent platforms



A Day in the Life



As the Digital Design Coordinator, you act as the creative genius who transforms our client’s ideas into stunning visual stories and immerse yourself in the creative strategies for each client.



Responsibilities include:



• Develop creative concepts, visual designs, and layouts for a wide range of ad projects based on client requests

• Create eye-catching banner and video ads using specific design software and tools

• Ensure visual materials align with brand guidelines and maintain a consistent brand identity

• Edit and retouch images, including color correction, cropping, and optimization for various platforms

• Incorporate feedback and revise designs based on client or team input

• Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work

• Work closely with internal teams to understand design objectives and project requirements

• Use tools like Canva and Creatopy to build ad creative efficiently

• Manage daily tasks and deadlines through Asana, ensuring timely delivery

• Stay updated on design trends, emerging technologies, and industry best practices

• Fulfill up to 120 creative assignments per month

• Other duties as assigned





Benefits & Perks



At Intrinsic Digital, you’ll have a front row seat at an early-stage small business that is driving innovation in multiple industries, as well as a chance to make a real impact on the growth of our business.



Intrinsic Digital offers a fast-paced, supportive, and diverse culture.



We offer:



Fully remote work setup

Company laptop & external monitor

$450 annual health & wellness stipend

$225 annual health & wellness stipend for child dependents

3-4 weeks of PTO based on tenure

Paid regular PH holidays

A fun, informal monthly event for the whole PH team featuring games and activities where you can earn points to redeem 
 vouchers

Fun asynchronous virtual events

All-expenses-paid annual team building activities (upcoming and past destinations include Boracay)

A choice of start times between 6 pm and 11 pm PHT

Night differential & 13th month benefits

Ability to qualify for quarterly sales bonuses of up to $1,020



Company Culture: 
/watch?v=v-dUCnifudI



HOW TO APPLY



1. Use "OLJ Design" as the subject,

2. Attach both links to your updated resume and/or portfolio, and

3. REQUIRED: Include a link to your 1-2 min audio introduction via 



We expect strong applicants to meet all these simple instructions from the get-go.

title: SENIOR Direct Response Copywriter (Weight Loss/Nutra) • Video Ads Specialist
description:
Are you a ruthless Direct Response Copywriter who understands that "pretty words" don't sell?



We are a rapidly growing D2C E-commerce brand in the Weight Loss & Supplements niche. We don't do "branding." We don't do "fluff." We do aggressive, problem-aware Direct Response marketing that stops the scroll and prints money.



We are looking for a SENIOR Copywriter to own our creative strategy.



?? READ THIS BEFORE APPLYING: If you rely on ChatGPT to write your hooks or scripts, DO NOT APPLY. We can smell AI copy from a mile away. We need a human psychologist who understands deep pain points, visceral emotions, and unique mechanisms.



The Mission: Your main focus will be Top-of-Funnel Video Creatives 
, Instagram, TikTok). You will feed our media buying team with high-converting concepts.



What you will be doing:



Deep Research: Mining Reddit, Amazon reviews, and forums to find the "bleeding neck" problems of our avatar (Women/Men looking to lose weight).



Scriptwriting: Writing high-paced, hook-heavy scripts for UGC creators and VSLs. You understand pattern interrupts and visual storytelling.



Static Ads: Crafting headlines that punch hard for static images.



Angle Creation: constantly coming up with new "Big Ideas" and "Unique Mechanisms" to sell the supplement.



What we require:



Proven Experience in Nutra/Weight Loss: You know what you can and cannot say (Compliance). You know how to write aggressive copy without getting our Ad Accounts banned.



Mastery of Hooks: You know the first 3 seconds of a video are the only thing that matters.



Native-Level English: Perfect grammar, slang, and cultural nuances (US Market).



Data-Driven: You don't fall in love with your words. If it doesn't convert, you kill it and write a better one.



The Offer:



Salary: $1,800 - $2,500 USD / Month (Based on experience & test task).



Position: Full-Time (Long term).



Growth: Work with a team that spends heavily on ads. Your copy will be seen by millions.



HOW TO APPLY: We do not look at generic resumes. To be considered, you must fill out this form specifically created to filter out AI users and amateurs:

title: Online Business Manager
description:
About Us



We are a UK-based charity supporting families with babies and young children during times of hardship. Like many charities, we’ve faced funding and operational challenges and are now entering a 90-day recovery and rebuild phase.



We’re looking for a calm, organised, and proactive Online Business Manager to help us stabilise income, coordinate volunteers, and put simple systems in place so our local services can restart safely.



About the Role



This is a strategic coordination role, not a hands-on “do everything” job.



Your main responsibility is to recruit, organise, and support volunteer project managers to run three key income streams:



GoFundMe crisis appeal



eBay / online sales



Charity bucket collections



You’ll also support a UK-based Local Baby Bank Manager and ensure the charity has clear systems, reporting, and weekly financial visibility.



Key Responsibilities



Recruit and coordinate volunteer project managers for fundraising pipelines



Set clear targets, timelines, and weekly check-ins



Support recruitment and onboarding of the Local Baby Bank Manager



Streamline systems for reporting, referrals, and volunteer coordination



Track weekly KPIs and cashflow and report to senior leadership



Keep everything organised, documented, and realistic.



What We’re Looking For



Essential:



Strong English communication (written and spoken)



Experience in operations, coordination, admin management, or non-profit work



Confident using Google Docs, Sheets, WhatsApp, Zoom



Organised, reliable, and calm under pressure



Desirable (not required):



Charity or fundraising experience



Experience managing volunteers or remote teams



Why This Role Is Different



Clear structure and expectations



Supportive leadership (you won’t be left alone)



Meaningful impact during a critical recovery phase



Long-term potential beyond the crisis period

title: Customer Success Manager – Client-Facing (EST, Professional Services)
description:
???? PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE APPLYING.

This is a senior, client-facing Customer Success role, not a Virtual Assistant position.

You will speak directly with U.S. clients on live Zoom calls and manage high-stakes relocation cases.



Lux Nomads is a premium relocation services company helping individuals and families move from the United States to Europe. Our clients are navigating immigration, taxes, housing, family logistics, and major life transitions. Many are anxious, overwhelmed, and making time-sensitive decisions that affect their future.



This role exists to own the client journey from start to finish.



We are hiring a Customer Success Manager to manage a portfolio of 40–60 high-touch clients simultaneously. You will act as the primary relationship owner, decision guide, and communication bridge between the client and multiple stakeholders.



This is a professional, client-facing role requiring maturity, judgment, and confidence.



???? WHAT YOU WILL ACTUALLY BE DOING (DAY-TO-DAY)



This is not task execution or admin support. You will be responsible for:



Client Ownership & Communication

 • Serving as the primary point of contact for 40–60 active relocation clients

 • Leading live Zoom calls with U.S. clients (onboarding, check-ins, issue resolution)

 • Setting and reinforcing realistic expectations around timelines, process, and next steps

 • Communicating proactively so clients never feel lost or ignored

 • Delivering calm, structured guidance during high-stress or emotional 
nts



Timeline & Process Management

 • Managing multiple client timelines simultaneously, each at a different stage

 • Tracking documentation, deadlines, approvals, and dependencies

 • Anticipating risks before they become escalations

 • Keeping clients moving forward even when progress depends on third parties



Partner & Stakeholder Coordination

 • Coordinating directly with:

 • Immigration attorneys

 • Tax advisors

 • Housing partners

 • Internal operations teams

 • Following up with external partners to keep cases moving

 • Translating complex or unclear information into clear, client-friendly explanations



Documentation & Systems

 • Maintaining accurate, detailed records in CRM and internal systems

 • Writing clear internal notes so any tea
mber can understand a client’s status instantly

 • Flagging recurring issues or gaps to leadership to improve processes



Professional Judgment

 • Knowing when to reassure vs. when to set firm boundaries

 • Knowing when to escalate vs. when to solve independently

 • Representing Lux Nomads with professionalism, empathy, and authority at all times



???? THIS ROLE IS A FIT FOR YOU IF:

 • You have 3–5+ years in Customer Success, Client Services, or Account Management

 • You’ve managed high-touch clients through complex or stressful situations

 • You are confident leading live calls with U.S. clients

 • You are extremely organized and can manage 40–60 moving pieces without dropping the ball

 • You communicate clearly, directly, and calmly under pressure

 • You are comfortable working fixed U.S. Eastern Time hours

 • You prefer ownership and responsibility over task-based work



???? THIS ROLE IS NOT A FIT IF:

 • You are looking for VA, admin, or task-based work

 • You prefer asynchronous work with minimal client interaction

 • You are uncomfortable leading live video calls

 • You need flexible or shifting work hours

 • You struggle with ambiguity or emotionally charged situations



? WORK SCHEDULE (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

 • Full-time (40 hours/week)

 • Fixed U.S. Eastern Time (EST) hours

 • Daily availability for live calls



???? REQUIRED TO APPLY



Please answer the following questions in writing. Thoughtful, specific answers are required.

 1. Describe your experience managing high-touch clients through complex or emotional processes.

 2. How do you stay organized when managing 40–60 clients at different stages?

 3. Share an example of a time you handled a frustrated or anxious client. What did you do?

 4. Describe your experience leading live Zoom calls with U.S. clients.



Applications without detailed answers will not be reviewed.

title: Full-Time Video Editor for Social Media Content
description:
We’re looking for a full-time, intermediate-to-experienced Video Editor to help us create engaging video content across multiple brands and social media platforms.



This role is ideal for someone who understands what performs on social media, stays up to date with trends, and knows how to turn ideas and raw footage into content that grabs attention and drives engagement.

, and YouTube Shorts

- Trend-based videos

- Working across multiple brands, each with different vibes and audiences

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Job Opportunity: Social Media Manager & Ads Specialist (Remote VA)

Brands: Padel League International & PISTA74

Location: 100% Remote

Type: VA / Freelance

Are You Ready to Serve?

At Padel League International, we are building the world’s most vibrant amateur padel community. At PISTA74, we are dressing that community in premium, "court-to-street" athleisure. We are looking for a dynamic, creative, and data-driven Social Media Manager to join our team and help us dominate the digital court.

This isn't just about posting pictures; it’s about building a movement. You will be the voice of two brands that live at the intersection of competitive sport and high-end lifestyle.

What You’ll Do

 * Create & Curate: Design "sporty-chic" visual assets in Canva and edit high-energy, viral-ready content for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and
.

 * Manage Meta Ads: Take the lead on our paid social strategy. You’ll set up, monitor, and optimize Meta Ad campaigns to drive league sign-ups and apparel sales.

 * Trend Watch: Stay ahead of social trends and padel news. You’ll analyze our data to see what’s working and pivot our strategy in real-time.

 * Community Engagement: Interact with our followers, manage the content calendar, and ensure our brands feel human and accessible.

 * Operations: Stay organized using Google Workspace to manage assets, reporting, and team communications.

What You Bring to the Court

 * Fluent English: You have impeccable written English with the ability to write witty, engaging captions and professional ad copy.

 * Design & Video Chops: You are a Canva Pro and a wizard with short-form video editing (CapCut/InShot/Adobe Premiere).

 * Ads Expertise: You aren't afraid of the Meta Ads Manager. You understand targeting, A/B testing, and how to read a ROAS report.

 * Tech Savvy: You are proficient in Google Drive, Sheets, and Docs.

 * The Vibe: You have an eye for aesthetics (critical for PISTA74) and an appreciation for the fast-paced world of sports (essential for the League).

Why Join Us?

 * Dual-Brand Experience: Work across two distinct but connected industries: sports management and fashion.

 * Growth Potential: As the brands grow, you grow. We value long-term collaborators.

 * Total Flexibility: Work from anywhere in the world.

title: Operations Assistant for Fast Paced Digital Marketing Agency
description:
About the Role



We are seeking a highly intelligent, proactive, and detail-obsessed Virtual Assistant to support our Creative Director, Pod Leaders (Project Managers), and broader agency team. This role requires excellent communication skills, exceptional organization, and a strong sense of ownership. You must be able to anticipate needs, flag issues before they become problems, and confidently move projects forward without waiting for permission.



This is a fast-paced, high-pressure environment with quick turnaround expectations. We are looking for someone who operates with integrity, takes accountability seriously, and consistently strives for excellence—someone who doesn’t mind staying a little later when needed to get the job done right.



If you are resourceful, solutions-oriented, and energized by managing multiple moving pieces at once, you will thrive here.



Key Responsibilities



Project Coordination & Workflow Management

Coordinate directly with the Creative Director and Pod Leaders to manage client deliverables.

Move tasks through each stage of the workflow (creation ? review ? revisions ? approval ? scheduling ? publishing).

Set up task cards, task details, subtasks, descriptions, and deadlines in platforms like Notion and Nifty.

Follow up with clients and internal tea
mbers to gather missing information proactively—whether from clients, tea
mbers, past documentation, or internal assets—and ensure tasks are ready for execution

Maintain clear, up-to-date task statuses for newsletters, blogs, and social media content across multiple clients.

Flag potential issues proactively and offer suggested solutions.



Content Operations

Organize, track, and manage newsletters, blog posts, and social media assets (you do not need to write or design them).

Schedule social media content through GoHighLevel (knowledge preferred but not required).

Ensure all content follows internal guidelines and is prepared for team review or client approval.



Administrative Support

Manage spreadsheets, trackers, and reporting documents with exceptional accuracy.

Follow established processes while confidently making decisions to keep projects moving.

Communicate effectively with tea
mbers and clients through written and verbal channels.

Assist with quality control in conjunction with the Quality Control Manager by ensuring deliverables are handled, organized, and finalized correctly.



Required Skills & Qualities



Professional Skills

Excellent written and spoken English (grammar, clarity, professionalism).

Strong organizational skills and ability to manage many detailed tasks simultaneously.

High-level decision-making ability and willingness to act independently when appropriate.

Ability to work efficiently under pressure and adapt quickly to shifting priorities.

Tech-savvy and able to learn new tools quickly.

Strong coordination, follow-through, and project management instincts.



Personal Qualities

Smart, intuitive, and able to think outside the box.

Extremely detail-oriented and punctual.

Honest, accountable, and trustworthy.

Strong sense of responsibility and ownership.

Solutions-focused and results-driven.

Willing and able to occasionally work beyond standard hours when deadlines require it.

Consistently motivated to do your best work.



Tools & Platforms We Use

(You do not need to know all of these, but familiarity is a plus.)

GoHighLevel

Notion

Nifty

Google Drive

Loom

Zoom

Kajabi

WordPress

Canva

Adobe Creative Suite

CapCut



Work Schedule

Monday–Friday, 9AM–5PM EST - Availability during these core hours is required for the first 6 months. After this period, schedule flexibility may be discussed based on performance and workload.



Bonus Skills (Not Required but Highly Valued)

Strong writing or editing abilities

Basic design skills (Canva or Adobe Suite)

Experience scheduling content or managing workflows in GoHighLevel

Prior agency, project coordination, or operations experience



How to Apply



Please follow all steps. Applications missing anything will not be considered.



- Start your application message with the phrase: “Details Are My Superpower”

- Attach your resume/CV (PDF preferred)

- Include a 2–3 minute intro video link recorded specifically for this application

- Introduce yourself

- Share relevant experience

- Explain why you’re a fit for this role

- Do not submit a pre-recorded or generic intro video



Answer these questions directly in your application:



1. Why are you a strong fit for this role?

2. Describe a time you proactively solved a problem.

3. Which tools from our list have you used before?

4. Can you work Monday–Friday, 9AM–5PM EST for the first 6 months?

title: Billing/AR Specialist
description:
Billing/AR Specialist - Ally Logistics



ABOUT ALLY LOGISTICS:

Ally Logistics is a U.S.-based third-party logistics (3PL) company headquartered in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Since 2012, we’ve been committed to creating the ultimate freight shipping experience by operating at the optimal intersection of people and technology. As a full-service 3PL, we specialize in a wide range of freight solutions, including dry van, refrigerated, drayage, straight truck, open deck/flatbed, drop-trailer programs, warehousing, and more. Our diverse service capabilities allow us to support shippers across industries with flexible, reliable, and scalable logistics strategies.

We partner with skilled global talent to support our continued growth and operational excellence, ensuring our customers receive efficient, high-quality service at every step of the supply chain.





ROLE SUMMARY:

The Billing/AR Specialist is responsible for accurate execution of billing, collections, and cash application tasks, as well as timely resolution of exceptions, to ensure financial operations run smoothly. The role includes processing customer invoices in accordance with customer requirements, verifying carrier payment information, applying customer payments accurately, and resolving payment issues promptly with both internal and external teams. The position requires strong attention to detail, effective problem-solving skills, and meticulous exception management.



Regular Weekly Schedule (40 hours): Monday – Friday: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM Eastern Standard Time with 1-hour unpaid lunch break from 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Eastern. Overtime (40+ hours) requires manager approval.



JOB DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES: 

-Process carrier paperwork and billing via Triumphpay/Revenova; ensuring accuracy and compliance with customer requirements 

-Apply customer payments accurately

-Timely resolution of unidentified payments and customer payment discrepancies

-Responsible for on-time payment collection from assigned customers



COMPENSATION:

Compensation will be determined based on experience. All payments are issued in USD via Wise.



REQUIRED SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:

-Minimum of 2 years of experience in logistics/3PL industry

-Minimum of 2 years of Billing/AR experience, preferably within the logistics/3PL industry

-Strong written and verbal English communication skills

-Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

-Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

-High attention to detail and accuracy

-Exceptional organizational and time management skills 



Access to:

-A reliable computer with high-speed internet (Backup internet source (mobile hotspot or secondary line preferred)

-Webcam + microphone for Zoom calls

-Headset

-Professional remote workspace

-Ability to work U.S. business hours (EST)



Experience with:

-Outlook

-Zoom phone

-Slack

-Basic CRM or logistics platform



Additional Requirements

1. Technology & Equipment Requirements

-Reliable high-speed internet and computer

-Webcam + microphone for Zoom calls

-Quiet, professional workspace



2. Availability Requirements

-Ability to work U.S. Eastern Time

-Must provide advanced notice for planned time off

-Must maintain consistent communication (Slack responsiveness,
, etc.)

title: Marketplace Product & Listings Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled and versatile Marketplace Product & Listings Specialist to join a remote team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for building, managing, and optimizing product pages across multiple platforms—including primary Shopify store, upcoming international sites, and key marketplace partners like Macy's and Nordstrom. A core focus will be on creating compelling product experiences, enhancing visibility, driving sales growth, and ensuring a seamless online customer journey. Advanced technical proficiency in both front-end product page construction and back-end data management is essential. You will work 40 hours per week during American business hours and get paid on a weekly basis.



***Candidates MUST HAVE extensive experience in handling large Excel files and possess a comprehensive understanding of the end-to-end process for building product pages from scratch***







Key Responsibilities:



- Building product pages from the ground up across various marketplaces (Mirakl, Farfetch, Nordstrom, and others; not just Shopify), including managing attributes, imagery, categorization, and marketplace-specific requirements



- Advanced knowledge of Excel formulas (e.g., VLOOKUP / XLOOKUP, pivot tables) with the ability to work comfortably in large files to manage and audit product, pricing, and inventory data



- Experience managing product data across multiple channels simultaneously (Shopify + marketplaces), including keeping pricing, inventory, imagery, and attributes in sync



- Execute the launch of new products, marketing campaigns, and promotions across all digital storefronts.



- Ensure compliance with platform-specific policies and e-commerce best practices.



- Conduct A/B testing on product page elements (e.g., descriptions, images, layouts) to improve conversion rates.



- Collaborate closely with marketing, product, and international teams in the US and Europe to align on strategy and execution.



Qualification & Experience Requirements:



- 2+ years of hands-on experience building and managing product pages on Mirakl, Farfetch, Nordstrom, and various marketplaces; experience with other e-commerce platforms is a strong plus.



- Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including complex formulas, pivot tables, and data analysis for e-commerce.



- Experience in the fashion/apparel industry is required.



- Experience with Disco, CommerceHub, Mirakl, or similar marketplace/dropshipping platforms



- Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and a problem-solving mindset.



- Excellent communication skills and ability to work independently and as part of a distributed team.





Please include an updated copy of your CV

• Most active tea
mbers earn $10–$20+/hour consistently

Top performers earn more through consistency and tenure, not short-term spikes.

?? If you are looking for part-time work, freelance work, or a second job, please do not apply.

Jason Ritter

title: Sodial Media Manager
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled, creative, and action-driven Social Media Manager to take part ownership of growing and managing our social media presence.



If you are a results-focused social media expert with a passion for creating viral content, analyzing performance metrics, and driving real growth — we want to work with you.



What We're Looking For

We need someone who is more than just a “poster.”

We’re looking for a strategic thinker and creative leader who:

Has 2+ years of proven experience managing social media accounts professionally

Is highly skilled in Canva (graphics, reels, carousels, templates, branding)

Understands how viral content works and how to optimize posts for reach, engagement, and conversions

Is an action taker who does not wait for instructions and brings new ideas to the table

Can take full leadership of planning, creating, scheduling, and managing content

Provides analytics, insights, and recommendations to continually improve growth

Is a professional copywriter capable of writing high-quality captions, hooks, storytelling, and CTAs

Has a strong understanding of Instagram, TikTok,
, YouTube, and emerging platforms

Is reliable, proactive, and passionate about helping a brand grow



Responsibilities

You will be responsible for end-to-end management of our social media presence, including:

Content Creation & Strategy

Develop monthly content calendars and creative strategies

Create high-quality, branded content using Canva (graphics, videos, reels, carousels, quotes, etc.)

Write compelling captions, hooks, and storytelling copy

Generate content ideas and trends designed to go viral

Ensure content aligns with brand voice and goals

Account Management

Post and schedule content consistently

Manage comments, DMs, and community engagement

Optimize profile branding, bios, highlights, and layout



Analytics & Reporting

Track performance metrics (reach, followers, engagement, conversions)

Identify growth opportunities and improvements

Provide weekly/monthly performance reports with insights and action plans



Growth & Creativity

Offer fresh, creative concepts that improve visibility

Proactively test new formats, post types, and trends

Develop strategies for increasing reach, engagement, and followers

Make data-driven recommendations to help the brand scale



Requirements

Minimum 2 years of experience managing business social media accounts

Expert Canva skills (portfolio required)

Strong understanding of content psychology, trends, and virality

Excellent English writing skills (copywriting required)

Ability to work independently and take initiative

Experience with analytics tools (Meta Insights, IG Analytics, etc.)

Organized, detail-oriented, and reliable

Ability to edit short-form video is a plus, but not required

Experience in your industry/niche is a plus



Personal Qualities We Value

Action taker, doesn’t wait to be told what to do

Creative thinker, always bringing new ideas

Growth-driven, constantly looking to improve results

Leadership mindset, takes full ownership of social media

Loves experimenting and staying up-to-date with trends

Professional and responsible



Compensation

Competitive pay (based on skill level and experience)

Bonuses available for performance and growth milestones

Flexible working schedule

Long-term growth opportunities with the company



How to Apply

Please send:

A short introduction about yourself

Your resume / CV

Links to previous social media accounts you have managed

A Canva design portfolio (or sample content)

Your expected monthly or hourly rate

A brief explanation of a successful growth strategy you’ve used in the past

title: Magento Developer
description:
We’re looking for an experienced Magento Developer to join our team and help build, maintain, and improve high-quality Magento 2 eCommerce solutions. This role is ideal for someone comfortable working across both back-end and front-end Magento, with a strong focus on clean, scalable code and best-practice development.



We use the Hyvä theme, so experience with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js is highly desirable.

What We Offer

 - Interesting eCommerce projects with real technical challenges



 - Collaborative and supportive team environment



 - Competitive salary / day rate

title: Proxy & Network Specialist (Remote — Philippines)
description:
We’re seeking a detail-oriented Proxy & Network Specialist based in the Philippines to manage proxy infrastructure and support legitimate testing and research activities. This role focuses on maintaining proxy services for lawful uses such as load testing, geolocation QA, ad verification, and data collection that complies with target sites’ terms of service and applicable laws.



Responsibilities:



Deploy, configure, and maintain residential, datacenter, and rotating proxies for approved testing use cases

Monitor proxy health, performance, uptime, and IP reputation

Implement authentication, access controls, and usage logging

Optimize proxy routing and latency for regional testing

Document configurations, inventories, and procedures

Work with engineering and compliance teams to ensure all activity follows sites’ terms of service and local regulations

Troubleshoot network issues and liaise with providers for onboarding and support

Requirements:



Based in the Philippines; fluent in English

2+ years experience with proxies, VPNs, or network infrastructure

Hands-on with proxy management tools, SOCKS/HTTP proxies, and authentication methods

Familiarity with IP reputation, rate-limiting, and anti-abuse best practices

Basic Linux, shell scripting, and network troubleshooting (tcpdump, Wireshark) skills

Strong documentation, communication, and compliance-oriented mindset

Nice to have:



Experience with automated testing tools, load testing, or web QA

Understanding of privacy, security, and ethical scraping practices

title: Operations & Accounts Administrator (Refrigeration Services)
description:
About the Role

We are a growing commercial refrigeration service business and have recently expanded with a franchisee engineer working on a self-employed, pay-per-job model. We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Remote Operations & Accounts Administrator to help manage job costing, engineer hours, invoicing, and scheduling.

This is a key role that will help ensure accurate billing, cost control, and smooth day-to-day operations.

Key Responsibilities

Record and manage engineer job costs and hours per job

Verify engineer time logs against job details and system records

Prepare and manage customer invoices to ensure accurate billing

Maintain bookkeeping records (income, expenses, job profitability tracking)

Use and learn our field management software to schedule incoming jobs

Answer and manage customer phone calls and basic enquiries in fluent English

Liaise with engineers and management regarding jobs, hours, and invoices

Produce basic reports on job costs, margins, and outstanding invoices

Required Skills & Experience

Strong bookkeeping or accounting background (freelancer, VA, junior accountant, or similar)

Excellent spoken and written English (for calls and customer communication)

High attention to detail and accuracy with numbers

Comfortable using software systems (job management, spreadsheets, accounting tools)

Organised, reliable, and able to work independently

Experience with Xero, QuickBooks, or similar accounting software is a plus

Desirable (Not Essential)

Experience working with trades or service businesses (plumbing, HVAC, electrical, etc.)

Experience with field service management software

UK business or VAT knowledge

title: Appointment Setter
description:
Location: Remote

Role Type: Full-time

Timezone: Must be available during UK business hours



About the Company

Voqqal is a mission-driven coaching company that helps international students and recent graduates land jobs in the UK at companies that can sponsor them. Our flagship programme is a practical, step-by-step system that takes clients from struggling with applications and getting ghosted to landing job offers, on average within 10 weeks.



We come from the recruitment industry. We've sat on the other side of the hiring table and built our method around how hiring actually works in the UK. 



The Role

We're hiring an Appointment Setter to engage new leads, build rapport, qualify prospects, and book calls with our closers. As our Appointment Setter, you're not just booking calls. You're the first human interaction for people who are stressed, struggling, and often scared about their future. You're helping them take the first step toward changing their situation.



What You'll Be Doing



Make 100+ dials a day and touch 50 new leads a day as your minimum KPI, 5 days a week.

Generate calls through outbound and follow-up methods including:



Calling leads who watched the VSL and booked their screening call with you

Calling leads who submitted an application but didn't schedule

Following up with past inbound leads who went cold





Qualify leads based on their situation, visa timeline, target industry, and readiness to commit.

Schedule qualified appointments with our Closers.

Nurture leads from initial contact through qualification.

Track all conversations and manage the pipeline in GoHighLevel (our CRM).

Be available to communicate daily through Slack, attend daily huddles, provide end-of-day reports, and keep CRM updated.



You will have the freedom to make your own schedule, with enough open calendar space to hit your booked call targets.



Compensation

This is a fixed base plus commission role.

$600 per month base salary, plus $2 for every qualified lead that shows up to their appointment.

On Track Earnings: $750-$1,000 per month. 



Ideal Candidate



Has a track record of success in a B2C appointment setting role, or has completed training in appointment setting.

Has experience making 100+ outbound calls a day.

Must have excellent spoken English with a clear, professional accent.

Is comfortable speaking with international prospects from diverse cultural backgrounds.

Can connect with leads who are stressed, overwhelmed, or uncertain, and help them feel heard.

Is available to work during UK business hours.

Is a self-starter, coachable, and looking to grow.

Thrives in a supportive, team-oriented environment.

Is proactive and driven, consistently meeting or exceeding targets.

Shows up on time, every time. No ghosting, no excuses.





What You'll Get



Warm leads who have already opted in and shown interest. You're not cold calling strangers.

A proven system: scripts, qualifying questions, and CRM workflows already built out.

A product you can genuinely believe in. Our clients land jobs, build careers, and stay in the country they chose.

Room to grow. Top setters who prove themselves have the opportunity to move into closing roles.

title: Video Editor
description:
Dear Future Video Genius,



If you're the kind of person who watches ads twice...once to feel, and once to study why they worked…



If you can turn raw footage into a story that sells, moves, and seduces — without anyone having to micromanage you…



And if you think “meh, good enough” is the most dangerous phrase in creative work…



Then read this carefully. Because this might be the most important opportunity you’ll come across this year.



This Is For You If...



- You don’t just edit videos — you craft attention-grabbing, scroll-stopping, conversion-pulling stories

- You study consumer psychology the way most people study TikTok dances

- You love balancing beauty with utility — creating content that looks good and performs better

- You respect deadlines, demand excellence from yourself, and never hide from feedback

- You take initiative, pitch ideas, and don’t wait to be told what to do

- You want to grow fast by working alongside serious, focused operators who actually give a damn



This Is Not For You If...



- You treat video editing like a task list, not a craft

- You need step-by-step instructions for everything

- You crumble when your idea gets outperformed by another

- You think “short-form” just means resizing, not reimagining



Here’s What You’ll Be Doing:



1) Organic Reels & TikToks



- Repurpose our studio-shot footage into 15–30s 9:16 vertical videos

- Create emotionally resonant edits using hooks, rhythm, story, and mood

- Keep it lean — no over-editing. Let performance do the talking



2) Performance Ads for Meta (FB/IG)



- Build direct response–style video ads that sell

- Add CTAs, motion graphics, and overlays that enhance without overwhelming

- Test, learn, adapt — fast

- Minimum Output (To Start):

- 5 Social Reels per week

- 5 Video Ads per week

(This will grow if you impress.)





Your Tools:

Adobe Premiere Pro / Final Cut / After Effects or equivalent

Motion graphics skills (even light ones) are a big plus

Bonus if you’re experimenting with AI, CapCut, or other trend-forward tools





Why You’ll Love This:

- You’ll work with an emerging premium jewelry brand built by people who respect art and performance

- No fluff. No corporate nonsense. Just high standards and creative freedom

- You’ll see your work live, tested, and scaled — with feedback loops to sharpen your skills weekly



To Apply:

Send us:

1) Your portfolio (especially short-form ads + UGC-style reels)

2) 2 short sentences on what makes your video work different

3) Your weekly availability and turnaround time

4) Use "LEMON" in the subject line of your application.

5) Take a personality test at 
 and include your results.



NOTE:



*We don’t care where you live, where you went to school, or how long you’ve been editing.

**We care if you can make people stop scrolling and start buying.



Looking forward,

The WOMUSE Creative Team

P.S. We’re building a best-in-class creative team. You in?

title: Growth Operator (Ecommerce & Creative Execution)
description:
We are looking for a high-ownership, detail-oriented Growth Operator who can manage and execute the operational and creative tasks of our ecommerce brand. You will work directly with the founder and remove all bottlenecks that slow down growth.



If you love organising chaos, coordinating creators, executing ideas fast, and making things actually happen, this role is for you.



What You Will Own (Your Responsibilities)



You will take over all the tasks that currently drain the founder:



1. Creative Coordination (Photos, Videos, Ads)

- Brief video editors and graphic designers

- Organise raw content into usable ad-ready assets

- Upload creatives into Meta Ads Manager

- Track performance and request new variations

- Maintain a weekly creative production system



2. Shopify & Etsy Management

- Upload new products

- Create product descriptions using templates

- Manage pricing, variants, discount logic

- Update product pages, collections, and offers

- Improve cart and checkout experience



3. Influencer & Ambassador Coordination

- Outreach and onboarding of UGC creators

- Request and collect content

- Track deliverables

- Maintain communication



4. Operational Support

- Coordinate with retouchers, videographers, contractors

- Follow up and ensure deadlines are met

- Handle customer service templates

- Manage returns and product replacements

- Communicate with suppliers & logistics partners



5. Founder Enablement (Your Most Important Duty)

- Your mission is simple:



>>>> Make the founder’s life easier. 



Remove all distractions.

Allow him to focus ONLY on strategy, ads, and revenue.



You are responsible for execution.

He is responsible for vision.



>>You Are Perfect for This Role If…



- You are extremely organised and love structure

- You thrive when given responsibility

- You learn fast and solve problems without waiting

- You enjoy managing people (editors, retouchers, creators)

title: Operations Lead (Airbnb / Short-Term Rental) — Client POC + Escalations Owner
description:
About VirtuPro



VirtuPro is a Dubai-based Short-Term Rental (Airbnb) Operations company. We manage the full back-end of day-to-day operations for holiday home operators and property managers — including 24/7 guest communication, cleaning coordination, maintenance coordination, check-in support, and reservation management.



Our clients are professional operators managing multiple units. We help them scale without operational chaos.



We have a team size of 20 Customer Support Agents who all sit in-house at our office in Lahore, Pakistan. They work in 3 shifts of 8-Hours each to ensure 24/7 Availability. 



We’re hiring an Operations Lead who will act as the senior point of contact for clients and manage escalations, quality, and team performance across shifts — while keeping daily firefighting away from the founder.



The Role (High-Level)



You are the “Ops Captain.”



You will:



Be the senior POC for our clients for operational updates, escalations, and high-level decisions.



Own escalations end-to-end and ensure fast resolution.



Lead and enforce standards across our operations team (Shift Leads + Associates).



Create structure, prevent recurring issues, and improve SOP compliance.



This is not a customer support role. This is a leadership + decision-making role inside a fast-moving Airbnb operations environment.



Key Responsibilities

1) Client Communication (Senior POC)



Handle top-level client communication (WhatsApp/Slack/Email).



Provide calm, structured updates: what happened, what we’re doing, by when, and how we prevent it.



Manage expectations and push back professionally when needed.



Lead weekly/bi-weekly operations review calls/messages with key clients.



2) Escalations & Problem Solving



Own escalations such as:



Cleaning failures / same-day turnover issues



Maintenance issues (AC, water, electricity, plumbing, lockouts)



Guest complaints that may lead to refunds or bad reviews



Reservation changes, disputes, and sensitive guest situations



Repeated operational issues that create client dissatisfaction



You will coordinate with the team + vendors and make decisions quickly.



3) Team Oversight (Shift Leads + Associates)



Ensure Shift Leads + Associates follow SOPs and execute properly.



Run daily handovers and ensure nothing falls through shift gaps.



QA guest communication quality and operational execution.



Coach, correct, and raise performance standards.



4) Systems & SOP Improvement



Identify bottlenecks and recurring problems.



Improve SOPs, checklists, and escalation rules.



Build structure that reduces daily firefighting.



5) Reporting (Founder Shield)



Provide a short daily summary to founder: top risks, escalations, resolutions, and blockers.



Maintain an escalation log and recurring-issues log with prevention actions.



What You Must Have (Required)



2+ years experience in Airbnb / short-term rental operations (property management, co-hosting, STR VA teams, or a similar environment).



Strong English written communication (you will message clients directly).



Experience handling escalations (refund situations, complaints, emergency ops).



Strong decision-making under pressure and ability to stay calm.



Leadership skills: you can enforce standards and hold people accountable.



Highly organized: comfortable working with trackers, SOPs, checklists, and KPIs.



Nice to Have (Bonus)



Experience with PMS tools (Guesty, Hostaway, Hospitable, Lodgify, etc.)



Experience managing remote teams across shifts



Experience handling claims/disputes workflows



Working Hours



Full-time, remote



You must be available for overlap with our key operation hours and be reachable for urgent escalations.



(Exact schedule will be shared with shortlisted candidates.)



Compensation



Competitive monthly salary based on experience



Long-term role with growth into senior operations management



How to Apply (Important)



Please send:



A short intro about your STR/Airbnb operations experience



The number of units/portfolios you’ve worked with



Examples of escalations you’ve handled (brief)



Tools you’ve used (PMS, communication, trackers)



Write a sample message to a client for this scenario:



Scenario:

A guest checks in and complains the unit is not properly cleaned. They want a refund and say they will leave a bad review. The cleaner is not answering and check-in was 1 hour ago.



Write the exact message you would send to the client.

title: Tax Virtual Assistant
description:
Position: Senior Bookkeeper / Senior Accountant



Role: Expert Advanced QuickBooks Online Certified Bookkeeper

Reports To: Firm Owner / Managing Director

Accounting Standard: U.S. GAAP ONLY



About the Role



We are looking for a highly experienced Senior Bookkeeper / Senior Accountant who lives and breathes U.S. GAAP bookkeeping and advanced QuickBooks Online (QBO) workflows.



This role is not transactional. You will own the accuracy, structure, and readiness of client books—ensuring they are clean, reconciled, tax-ready, and defensible.



NON-NEGOTIABLE REQUIREMENTS



Candidates must meet all of the following:



QuickBooks Online Advanced Certified ProAdvisor (proof required)

5+ years hands-on QBO bookkeeping experience

Strong, working knowledge of U.S. GAAP

Clear understanding of book-to-tax alignment

Expert-level handling of:

Accounts Receivable (A/R)

Accounts Payable (A/P)

Undeposited Funds

Proven cleanup and catch-up experience

Available full-time (40 hours/week)

Willing to log time daily

Comfortable working independently and following SOPs

Proactive problem-solver with strong attention to detail

References required

Portfolio of work with measurable outcomes

Must actively work with U.S. accounting and U.S. tax-ready books

REQUIRED TOOL STACK (Must Be Proficient)



You must already use—or demonstrate fast, confident mastery of:



QuickBooks Online (Advanced Certified required)

TaxDome (tasks, workflows, document requests, messaging, notes)

RightTool Pro (bulk edits, cleanup, reporting)

Google Workspace (Gmail, Drive, Sheets, Docs)

AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT) to improve speed, accuracy, and efficiency

CORE ACCOUNTING COMPETENCIES



You must confidently execute and explain:



Accrual vs Cash accounting (when and why)

A/R, A/P, Undeposited Funds, clearing accounts

Prepaids, accruals, amortization

Payroll accrual journal entries

POS journal entries

Year-end journal entries

Matching beginning balances to tax returns

Book-to-tax process

Equity & capital accounts

Capital tables

Cash flow forecasting

Budget vs actuals and variance analysis

You must also be able to quickly identify errors, including:



Incorrect negative balances

Undeposited Funds or A/R issues

Suspense or uncategorized account buildup

Reconciliations that don’t truly tie

INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE



Must have experience or pass a practical test for:



Contractor & trades bookkeeping

Job costing

Projects

Percentage of completion

Classes & locations

E-commerce

Stripe, Square, Jobber

Nice to have (testing required if no experience):



Law firms (trust / IOLTA accounting)

Medical practices

Insurance agencies (trust-style premium handling)

SCREENING PROCESS:



Candidates must submit:



Proof of QBO Advanced Certification

References

Portfolio of work

Completion of a practical test covering: Bill-pay workflow, Undeposited Funds with bulk deposits, Balance Sheet error identification, Account reconciliation with explanation, Demonstrated RightTool usage or fast mastery

Shift / Hours



Monday to Friday

Single fixed shift

3:00 PM – 12:00 AM Philippine Time

This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a structured, process-driven, results-oriented environment and takes pride in delivering clean, reliable, U.S. GAAP-compliant books.



Job Type: Full-time



Benefits:



Company Christmas gift

Flexible schedule

Health insurance

Work from home

Experience:



QBO: 5 years (Required)

US based clients: 3 years (Required)

TaxDome: 2 years (Required)

Accounting: 10 years (Required)

License/Certification:



QBO Advanced Certification (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: ???? EASY Part-Time ChatGPT Assistant – Simulate Games for Fictional Basketball League
description:

Hours: ~1–2 hours per week

Pay: PHP (flexible, depending on experience)

Start Date: ASAP

Location: Fully remote

For: One person — just doing this for fun / personal hobby project



?



? Job Overview



I run a fictional basketball league — called the NBL — just for fun. It’s not real, but it’s designed like a real pro league with players, stats, records, and weekly matchups. I use ChatGPT to simulate the games quarter by quarter. All I need is someone to help run the games and track results.



It’s super easy.



You don’t need to come up with anything yourself. All you have to do is:

    1.    Use ChatGPT (the chat is already set up)

    2.    Ask for the next quarter or game

    3.    Copy the score and stats into a simple spreadsheet or document



That’s it. You’re just helping me keep the league going by pushing the buttons and logging results.



?



???? Your Tasks

    •    Run ~7–8 short basketball games every 2 weeks inside ChatGPT

    •    Copy down the final scores

•    Copy down the final scores and player stats

    •    Keep the league standings updated

    •    Very occasionally write a one-sentence summary like “Team A wins a close one over Team B”



?? No math, no coding, no AI training. Literally just ask ChatGPT what happened and log it.



?



???? Who This Is For

    •    You like basketball (NBA, 2K, or even fantasy basketball)

    •    You’re detail-oriented and consistent

    •    You can follow instructions and stay organized

    •    You want a simple side job that’s low-stress and easy



No writing skill is needed — the AI does all the writing. You’re just moving things



? Time Commitment

    •    About 1–2 hours a week

    •    Totally flexible schedule

    •    Dead simple workflow



?



???? To Apply



Just send me:

    1.    A short message saying you’re interested

    2.    Any background you have with basketball or ChatGPT (not required)

    3.    Your expected weekly rate in PHP



That’s it!



?

title: Social Media Content Manager
description:
Social Media Content Manager - Love Drops Valentine's Campaign



About Augmento

Augmento creates digital treasure hunts for campaigns and businesses, think Pokemon Go, but for brands. We're launching Love Drops, a Valentine's campaign using Augmented Reality to help couples, especially those in long-distance relationships, discover hidden digital surprises in the real world.

We're going all-in on a viral-first strategy. We need someone who doesn't just manage accounts but makes people stop scrolling.



The Role

This is a hands-on position for someone who creates content and understands why it works. You'll own our social presence from concept to posting.

This starts as a gig, but if we're satisfied with the output, it turns into a full-time role and you become part of the Augmento team.



What you'll do:

Create short-form video content - Reels and TikToks with quick cuts, trending audio, and native-feeling edits that people actually want to share

Design visual assets - Stories and graphics with a premium, love-centered aesthetic

Manage daily operations - Posting, scheduling, community engagement, and keeping feeds polished

Maintain brand voice - Everything should feel innovative, personal, and cool



Requirements

2+ years of professional experience in social media management and content creation

Expert-level proficiency in Canva, CapCut, and Figma

Strong instinct for trends - you know what's about to peak, not what already has

A portfolio that proves you can turn a simple brief into thumb-stopping content



Creative Direction

Use this Pinterest board as your visual reference for the Love Drops aesthetic: 

Your content should match this vibe - warm, romantic, modern, and scroll-stopping.



How to Apply

Send us your portfolio with your best Reels, TikToks, and design work along with a short note telling us one trend you'd use for Love Drops right now and why.



We're moving fast. If you're ready to make Valentine's Day high-tech, apply now.

title: Ecommerce Video Editor
description:
Most video editor jobs?



They burn you out in 6 months. Endless revisions. Micromanagement. Different creative directors every week with different "visions." Then you're looking for the next gig.



This isn't that.



We have 2 video editors who've been with us for over 3 years. Our average employment? Around 3 years.



Why? Because if you're performing and growing as we grow—this is one of the most stable, rewarding video editor roles you'll find in e-commerce.



Let me be clear about what we're building here:



This is TheraPet. We're a fast-growing pet brand. And we need a Video Editor who understands direct response, AI-generated visuals, and most importantly—footage selection.



The editing part? Not complicated.



But choosing the right footage, the right hook, the right visual that works with the text on screen? That's where we need you to be the best.



Every visual should speak the same story. The hook should match the message. The visuals should reinforce what the copy says. Everything should align—from the first frame to the landing page.







That's the skill we're hiring for.



Here's what makes this different:



You own your work — Our senior video editor supervises you for the first few months. After that? You're autonomous. You work in a small pod with 2 strategists. No revolving door of people. No chaos.



Flexible schedule — Task-based. You manage your time. We expect around 5 hours/day of focused work. One meeting per week max. No exhausting Zoom marathons.



We value speed and learning — You execute fast. You're constantly learning. You stay curious. That's the culture.



Instant communication — We expect quick Slack responses. But that's it. No micromanagement. Just clarity and speed.







The compensation (let's talk numbers):



Fixed Salary: $1,500–$2,000/month (based on your current skills)



Quarterly Bonus: $1,000–$2,000 (performance-based)



Paid Leave



Insurance (covered after 6 months with us)



And here's the best part: As you grow, your salary grows. This isn't a dead-end role. It's a career.







What we're looking for:



2+ years editing for e-commerce brands (preferably 3+)



Deep understanding of direct response ads — hooks, pacing, retention psychology



AI video skills are a HUGE plus (Veo 3, Sora, Runway) — if you don't know them yet, we'll teach you



Excellence in footage selection — this is where the magic happens



Constant learner mindset — you don't settle, you improve







Your day-to-day:



Editing scroll-stopping ads for Meta, TikTok, YouTube

Sourcing or generating AI shots (hooks, UGC-style clips, product visuals)

Combining real footage + AI assets to create performance-driven creatives

Collaborating with strategists on new angles and concepts

No fluff. No busywork. Just high-impact creative work.







Why people stay with us:



Because we don't just hire and forget. We invest in you. We give you freedom, stability, and growth.



Our video editors don't leave because there's nowhere better to go. They stay because this is the better place.





To Apply:



Answer this question (we only review applications that include this):



1. Share your portfolio link (Google Drive, Frame, or whatever works)

title: Lease Administrator Virtual Assistant
description:
Please note: Applications submitted through this platform will not be reviewed. Kindly ensure your application is submitted via the form:



JOB DESCRIPTION SUMMARY:

Provides support to the Account Manager in managing all aspects of lease administration services to our real estate client accounts including but not limited to, lease administration, database management, accounts receivable, monthly rent preparation, and desk-top audit services. The Lease Administrator will ensure all lease administration services are provided in compliance with operation standards and contractual key performance indicators.



PRINCIPLE DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Participate in the day-to-day management of the lease administration for client real estate and equipment portfolios with special attention to account activities, vendor management, landlord issues, invoicing, and any other lease administration matters.

- Abstract lease amendments, sublease agreements, renewals and extensions, and ancillary real estate documents.

- Provide database management support and validate data integrity and completeness.

- Ensure lease records contain accurate, up-to-date details for the timely and correct payment of rent and other financial obligations.

- Maintain database with key information, including gross sales, landlord contacts and lease payments.

- Assist with monthly rent process and update annual recurring rent estimates in accordance with the terms of the lease.

- Review monthly rent statements and invoices from landlord and enter one-time expenses, including but not limited to, percent rent, common area maintenance, insurance, real estate tax, utilities and other rebillable expenses.

- Apply any receivables associated with sublease tenants within lease administration database.

- Perform desk-top audit of year end expenses in compliance with reconciliation requirements in the lease documents. Actively track and identify any potential cost savings or discrepancies.

- Enter CPI or other rent escalations and amortization schedules for capital improvement repairs. Ensure compliance with landlord and tenant obligations and validate the terms are in-line with the lease documents.

- Verify calculation of base year expenses and any expense cap or stop identified in the lease documents.

- Review and validate the calculation of tenant pro-rata share and expense gross-ups.

- Process certificate of insurance, estoppel and SNDA requests.

- Execute and maintain current processes and procedures. Update client playbook accordingly.

- Contribute to developing and recommending best practices to continually improve and streamline lease administration processes.

- Participate in client meetings involving internal stakeholders, as necessary.

- Serve as second level point of contact for any lease administration concerns.

- Maintain a strong working relationship with client. Participate in monthly meetings with account manager and client to review ongoing lease administration operations and tasks.



EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE QUALIFACTIONS:

- Bachelor’s degree in related field preferred.

- 3 to 5+ years of commercial lease administration, property management or property accounting experience.

- Understanding and comprehension of lease language related to operating and audit provisions.

- Prior experience with commercial leases and lease administration/lease accounting software helpful.



DESIRED KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:

- Strong organization and analytical skills.

- Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills.

- Exceptional time management skills, and able to problem solve creatively and resourcefully.

- Strong proficiency with MS Office, Adobe, SharePoint, and similar programs.

- Understanding and comprehension of commercial real estate leases, knowledge of operating and audit provisions in real estate leases.

- Effectively support more than one account manager or client account simultaneously and successfully.

- Ability to work independently or as part of a team.

- Accept new challenges and opportunities without difficulty.

- Pro-active, motivated, and diligent.

title: Junior Client Success Manager – SEO Agency (Full-Time, Remote)
description:
Junior Client Success Manager – Reporting & Client Support

(Full-Time, Remote – Philippines)

Salary

$800-1,000 USD/month (based on experience)

Compensation may be higher for candidates with proven SEO agency experience and strong familiarity with SEO reporting workflows and tools.



Role Details

Type: Full-Time

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Working Hours: 9 AM – 6 PM Philippine Time with some US overlap

Time Tracking: Required (Hubstaff)

Project Management Tool: Teamwork

Benefits:

After 3 months, tea
mbers qualify for paid vacation and additional company benefits.



Role Overview

We are hiring a detail-oriented Junior Client Success Manager to support our Client Success Manager by acting as a primary support layer for reporting, follow-ups, documentation, and internal coordination.



This role does not replace the Client Success Manager and does not own strategy or client relationships. Instead, this role exists to remove friction, strengthen reporting, capture details, and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.



You will help prepare reports, follow up with clients when needed, take detailed notes, identify risks, and serve as a communication bridge between the Client Success Manager and internal marketing coordinators.



When done well, this role makes client conversations stronger, reporting clearer, and delivery smoother.



Core Responsibilities

Reporting & Insights Support (Primary Focus)

• Build and prepare monthly SEO reports in collaboration with the Client Success Manager

• Pull and organize data from tools such as:

– BrightLocal

– Google Analytics

– Local Dominator

– Google Business Profile insights

• Review Local Dominator scans and reporting data to identify notable trends or signals

• Ensure reports are completed on time and uploaded to all client dashboards

• Strengthen reports by surfacing relevant data points that support deliverables and performance

• Review reports for completeness, accuracy, and clarity before review with the Client Success Manager



Client Support & Follow-Ups

• Send light client follow-ups related to reporting timelines or confirmations when needed

• Support onboarding by joining client meetings and assisting with documentation and next steps

• Help ensure client questions are tracked and addressed promptly

• Maintain a professional, clear, and supportive communication style



Internal Coordination & Documentation

• Act as a bridge between the Client Success Manager and Marketing Coordinators, especially around reporting and deliverables

• Step in to assist with reporting preparation when Marketing Coordinators are at capacity

• Take detailed notes from client calls, meetings, and internal discussions

• Document client preferences, feedback, risks, and important context in Teamwork

• Surface potential risks or concerns early so the Client Success Manager can address them proactively



Support & Collaboration

• Work collaboratively with the Client Success Manager to review reports and align on messaging

• Translate data, observations, or opportunities into clear inputs for client conversations

• Help ensure the Client Success Manager has the information needed to focus on higher-value relationship and strategy work



Required Experience & Skills

• 1+ year of experience in a client-facing, coordination, or support role

• Strong written and spoken English

• High attention to detail and comfort working with data

• Strong note-taking and documentation skills

• Highly organized and dependable with recurring deadlines

• Comfortable working under pressure without getting overwhelmed

• Proficient with Google Workspace

• Comfortable using Teamwork and Hubstaff

• Able to follow SOPs and structured workflows

• Bonus: Basic understanding of SEO, reporting tools, or digital marketing terminology



Behavioral & Work Style Fit (Important)

This role strongly favors candidates with the following DISC profile:

• High C (Conscientiousness): detail-oriented, accurate, data- and process-driven

• Moderate S (Steadiness): reliable, calm, consistent month to month

• Low D (Dominance): supportive, execution-focused, not directive

• Low–Moderate I (Influence): clear and professional communicator

If you dislike documentation, reporting, follow-ups, or structured work, this role will not be a fit.



To Apply

• Include “CLIENTCARE” in your subject line

• Briefly describe a time you supported a manager or client by catching details, preparing materials, or preventing an issue

• Attach your resume or a link to your OnlineJobs profile



Final Note

This role is a force multiplier for Client Success. You are not expected to replace ownership, but to strengthen execution, reporting, and continuity so client relationships are better supported and nothing gets missed.

If you take pride in preparation, follow-through, and making others more effective, we want to hear from you.

title: X (Twitter) Ghostwriter for Public Figure
description:
**X 
) Ghostwriter for Public Figure**

Vysta Paid Media Group

Full-time

Remote (Pakistan preferred)



We are hiring an elite X ghostwriter to build, manage, and scale a personal brand on X for a public-facing founder in the paid media and growth space.



This is not a scheduling role.

This is not “write tweets from prompts.”

This is a thinking role.



You will be responsible for turning expertise, opinions, data, and experience into high-impact X content that grows audience, authority, and inbound opportunity.



If you do not deeply understand what performs on X in 2024 and why, this role is not for you.



### What You’ll Own



* End-to-end ownership of the X account

* Daily posting cadence with high signal content

* Research, ideation, writing, and iteration of tweets and threads

* Turning long-form ideas, voice notes, and rough thoughts into sharp posts

* Studying high-performing accounts in marketing, founders, and operators

* Identifying trends, formats, and hooks that actually drive growth

* Writing in the founder’s voice, not your own

* Tracking performance and doubling down on what works



### What “Good” Looks Like



* Clear positioning as an authority, not a motivational account

* Strong hooks, clear opinions, and practical insights

* Threads that educate, challenge, or reframe thinking

* Consistent growth in followers, impressions, and profile visits

* Content that attracts the right audience: founders, operators, marketers



### Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



* Proven experience growing X accounts from scratch or scaling existing ones

* Deep understanding of X algorithms, formats, and distribution

* Strong copywriting skills with clarity and edge

* Ability to research and synthesize complex topics quickly

* Comfortable working with minimal hand-holding

* Excellent written English

* Obsessed with quality and performance, not volume



Bonus points if you have:



* Experience ghostwriting for founders or public figures

* Background in marketing, paid media, startups, or SaaS

* Examples of accounts you have grown or content you’ve written



### How We Work



* You will work closely with the founder

* Direction will be high-level, not prescriptive

* You are expected to bring ideas, not wait for instructions

* Quality and output matter more than hours logged



### Why This Role Matters



This X account is a long-term asset.

The goal is to build a dominant voice in paid media and growth.



If you execute well, this role has:



* Long-term stability

* Increased responsibility

* Opportunity to grow into a lead content role

title: Marketing Manager (30h/week, 4$/h, 20% commissions)
description:

Our growing team is looking for a Marketing Manager (20 hours per week) to help us MONETIZE our existing social media and
 audience, about AI and artificial intelligence. Your job is to find ways to make money for us (we do have products for sale, but didn’t know how to use them, and also didn’t have enough time). You receive 20% of every sale + your hourly rate. The more we get = more you get. + you work on our existing socials that are big.

You won’t start from zero. We already built the audience.



-
 Group - 170,000+ members

-
 Group - 150,000+ members

-
 list - 10,000 subscribers (+2,000 new every month)

- Premiu
mbership + online courses ready to sell

 tools
